titleStmt.title: The blood of righteous Abel crying from the ground being a lamentation for and a warning too [sic] all that have a hand against the innocent people of God, especially intended for the rulers and priests in Hamshire ... / by W.B.
titleStmt.author: Bayly, William, d. 1675.

notesStmt.note: Imperfect: pages cropped with slight loss of print.
